short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have a chatroom for every page you visit online and interact with people visiting the same page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Interact with people visiting the same webpage and share your opinions and thoughts.

Yabber for Chrome allows you to share your thoughts, opinions, and emotions with people visiting the same webpage as you. Whether you’re watching your favorite TV series, reading an article, or playing a game online, you can now seamlessly interact with people engaged in the same activity as you.

Have you ever wanted to discuss an article or a video you’re watching with others? Share your thoughts, emotions, laughs, and comments. Use Yabber!

➤ Terms and Conditions

By installing the extension, you agree to and acknowledge:
https://www.getyabber.com/terms/browser-extension

➤ How it works

Click on the Yabber extension icon. The extension will open in a sidebar.

➤ What’s included?

~ Free
• Chat rooms
• Comments
• Private notes
• Themes
• Bookmarks (coming soon)
• Ratings (coming soon)

➤ Privacy first approach

• You can request the deletion of your account at any time. After 30 days, the system will erase all the data linked to you.
• The server only stores messages for about 30 minutes, but comments, notes, and other data will remain stored until you delete them.
